data.title: jeanbaudin.com
data.text:
eBook (PDF/MP3) Download: $15

Jean Baudin - "The Mechanics of Tapping" eBook

This 58-page eBook outlines Jean's innovative approach to tapping. Aimed at beginners and intermediates, this book presents materials in easy-to-understand tabulature with fingerings for both left and right hand, and Mp3s included for many of the exercises. All tabs are written for 5-string bass, however all bassists and even guitarists can learn from this book. Excerpts from Jean's solo work, as well as Nuclear Rabbit, Element of Surprise, and other songs are included.

eBook (includes PDF and Mp3s). 18 megs zipped.

Includes:

- Finger Excercises

- Octaves

- Arpeggios

- Two-handed Argeggiated Chords

- Traditional Two-Handed Tapping

- Vanishing (Jean Baudin)

- Puppy Love (Jean Baudin)

- Frosty Acres (Jean Baudin)

- My Girls Got Guts (Nuclear Rabbit)

- Alone with My Clone (Nuclear Rabbit)

- Look who's Cross-eyed Now (Nuclear Rabbit)

- Truth's Ugly Head (Nuclear Rabbit)

- San Francisco Treat (Nuclear Rabbit)

- Lemmings (Nuclear Rabbit)

- Inspiration (Element of Surprise)

- Flip the Switch (Element of Surprise)

- Greensleeves

- J.S Bach's Tocatta

- ...And much more!

CD: OUT OF PRINT

Nuclear Rabbit - "Vicuna"

1996 Full-Length CD from Nuclear Rabbit - Greg, Jean, Pat and Steve. Includes select tracks from the original three Nuclear Rabbit Demo Tapes. Jean plays a 5-string Ralf bass on this one. Very Limited quanities, once these CDs are sold - they are gone for good.

Digital download and samples available from iTunes
